posts.body: My name is Shashi Bhushan. I am a second year undergraduate student of the department of applied geology enrolled in its BS degree course at IIT Kharagpur. I am a boarder of Meghnad shah hall of Residence .I born and brought up in Bihar(which is famous for Cracking India's one of the toughest exam UPSC).
Thought of the day--- Don't Count the Days, Make the Days Count.
If Sunny leone marriage sunny deol-She will also become sunny Deol || @Xavier commented on this--if lara dutta marriages Brain Lara she becomes lara lara bolo tara rara rara.
